name: The Mythical City
description:
Your task is to protect the magic crystal, to which waves of enemies are coming. To win, you need to summon soldiers on the battlefield, mana is consumed for this. You can also use mana to build towers and use magic, which opens when you get a new level. There are several types of enemies, some attack near, others attack from afar, some are divided into two new enemies when they die… Combine abilities and you will win!

Features:
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Crowds of enemies
  • Interesting gameplay
